title: Vary easy one (Similar to Eurostile extended)
content:
[http://www.lacamarga.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023162546/http:/www.lacamarga.com/ "http://www.lacamarga.com/")

Need to know the name of the type in "La Camarga" logo.

Flash site, so you can zoom it to better see the font.

I know I'd know the name but my mind is blank now!!!!

Virtual coffee to first correct answer! :-)  
Thanks
